General.Name: Memsensing Microsystems Suzhou China Co Ltd
General.Description: MEMSensing Microsystems (Suzhou, China) Co., Ltd. provides MEMS sensor products and solutions in China. The company offers MEMS acoustic sensors, MEMS pressure sensors, MEMS inertial sensors, MEMS force sensors, MEMS flow sensors, and infrared thermopile sensors for various industries, including consumer electronics, industrial control, medical electronics and automotive, etc. It also provides technical consultation and technical services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
